name: Alpha

use: you need a background to visualize alpha in color pickers.
avoid: transparency is not part of the UI.

examples.minimal:
CustomPaint(
  painter: AlphaPainter(),
  size: const Size(120, 40),
)

theming: Uses fixed colors; wrap with `ColorFiltered` if you need custom tints.
accessibility: Pair alpha patterns with numeric opacity labels for clarity.
dont: Use as a general background texture.
